data.title: Historic Stanley Estes Park Hotel
data.meta_description: Stanley Hotel In Estes Park, CO offers 4 types of hotel accommodations including 1909 historic hotel rooms, historic boutique hotel, modern hotel rooms, and 1 to 3 bedroom condominiums perfect for groups. Enjoy stunning views of the Rocky Mountains. Stanl
data.text:
PLEASE NOTE:

​ Rooms will be cleaned and sanitized after each guest but not during the stay. If you would like new towels or linens, please call the front desk at 970-577-4000. Thank you for understanding. ​

Public parking is $10 for a commemorative token that can be redeemed for $5 anywhere on the property, or kept as a souvenir. Hotel guests should show proof of reservation to waive the parking fee at the booth upon arrival.

We do not have room or space to accommodate RV's, campers, or trailers. Please do not attempt to bring your RV, camper, or trailer as you will be turned around at the gate.

Must be 21+ to reserve and stay alone in a room at the Stanley Hotel

WE LOVE PETS, BUT ASK THAT YOU LEAVE YOURS AT HOME.

While we love pets and animals, we do not allow your furry family members to stay in any of the guest rooms. Thank you for understanding. ​

WELCOME TO AIDEN SINCLAIR'S UNDERGROUND

A MAGICAL UNDERGROUND THEATER AT THE STANLEY HOTEL

​

​HIDDEN BENEATH THE ORIGINAL CARRIAGE HOUSE OF THE HISTORIC STANLEY HOTEL,

​THERE IS A HIDDEN UNDERGROUND THEATER, WHERE THE GREATEST MAGICIANS IN THE WORLD PERFORM.​

BEHIND A SECRET BOOKCASE DOOR, THERE EXISTS A WORLD OF ILLUSION AND MYSTERY. A PLACE OUTSIDE OF TIME, WHERE THE RULES OF REALITY NO LONGER APPLY.​​

ENTER IF YOU DARE, FOR AN UNFORGETTABLE EXPERIENCE THAT WILL INSPIRE YOUR IMAGINATION IS WAITING FOR YOU.
